entry.def: Respectively means in the same order as the items that you have just mentioned.

example.ex: Their sons, Ben and Jonathan, were three and six respectively...
example.tran: 他们的儿子，本和乔纳森，分别是3岁和6岁。

example.ex: They finished first and second respectively.

sentences.sentence: "the brothers were called Felix and Max, respectively"

auth_sentence.content: Collyer and Wellington came second and third, respectively.
auth_sentence.res_content: Collyer and Wellington came second and third, respectively.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Collyer and Wellington came second and third, respectively.

auth_sentence.content: These are known as unfettered and fettered funds respectively.
auth_sentence.res_content: These are known as unfettered and fettered funds respectively.

auth_sentence.content: Britain's biggest drug company and chemicals company respectively.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Britain's biggest drug company and chemicals company respectively.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

jushi.english: The first, second and third prizes went to James,Lytton and Tom respectively.
jushi.chinese: 一等奖、二等奖、三等奖分别为詹姆斯、利顿和汤姆所得。

jushi.english: These two books were first published in, respectively 1939 and 1970.
jushi.chinese: 这两本书分别于1939年和1970年第一次出版。

jushi.english: John and Peter work and study respectively.
jushi.chinese: 约翰和彼得一个工作,一个学习。
